review: I have booked  the  appointment for myself. It was related to my pregnancy and i have visited the hospital. Doctor was quite good and he had done the check up. .I am fully satisfied with this treatment and there was no longer waiting time for me  in the hospital. medicines were prescribed by the doctor , now i am completely fine.

review: She was very understanding to the problem and gave a perfect guidance and clinical advice for the ailment. Appreciate her guidance on consultations to find the core problem and treat it and not just spot treatment. I would say a perfect amalgamation of clinical knowledge and experience rarely seen these days. After  visiting over half a dozen lady docs over a span of 3years I finally got one I shall stay put with all my life now! Thankyou so much Dr Harmeet.
